dropDown.whyToUse: Why adopt DORA Metrics with Elven?

heroSection.title: Transform your operations with
heroSection.subtitle: The four metrics that help engineering teams lead the way in
heroSection.subtitle2: measuring performance, identifying bottlenecks, and accelerating reliable delivery

metricsSection.title: What are the
metricsSection.subtitle: Developed after years of research with thousands of tech teams, the
metricsSection.subtitle2: are the four key metrics for software engineering.

deploymentFrequency.title: Deployment Frequency
deploymentFrequency.description: How often your team successfully delivers software.

leadTimeForChanges.title: Lead Time for Changes
leadTimeForChanges.description: How long it takes for a change to go from commit to deploy.

meanTimeToRestore.title: Mean Time to Restore
meanTimeToRestore.description: How quickly you can recover from a failure.

changeFailureRate.title: Change Failure Rate
changeFailureRate.description: Measures the percentage of changes that result in failures or issues.

benefitsSection.title: Why adopt the
benefitsSection.description: Our platform provides, processes, and displays the
benefitsSection.description2: in real-time, friction-free. You gain instant visibility into what needs improvement.

gitIntegration.title: Connect with GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket
gitIntegration.description: Native integration with your development tools

realTimeInsights.title: Real-time insights
realTimeInsights.description: Metrics automatically updated with real-time data

customizableDashboards.title: Customizable dashboards
customizableDashboards.description: Visuals tailored to your team’s needs

elvenPlatformIntegration.title: Elven Platform integration
elvenPlatformIntegration.description: Connect with the entire Elven tool ecosystem

benchmarking.title: Benchmark comparison
benchmarking.description: Compare your performance to industry standards

resultsSection.title: Results you can expect
resultsSection.description: Track performance in real-time with objective metrics. Get visibility into what's working and where to adjust.

results.lessTimeManualWork: Less time on manual metrics, more on productivity
results.moreTeamsAligned: Teams releasing more frequently and consistently

priceSection.title: Choose the ideal plan for your operation
priceSection.description2: to your team’s maturity level, with options that grow with your challenges.

plans.title: Estimated monthly cost
plans.warning: This value is an estimate based on your configuration. For a custom quote, talk to our team.

isComplex.question: Does it require complex setup?
isComplex.answer: No! Our integration is simple and fast. Connect your repositories and start viewing your metrics in minutes.

howMetricsAreGenerated.question: How are the metrics collected?
howMetricsAreGenerated.answer: We integrate directly with your development tools (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket) to collect data automatically, without impacting your operations.

isMetricsStandardized.question: Are the metrics standardized?
isMetricsStandardized.answer: Yes, we strictly follow the DORA (DevOps Research and Assessment) standards established by Google Cloud.

hasHistoryByTeams.question: Can I see historical data by team?
hasHistoryByTeams.answer: Yes, you can view metrics by team, project, or specific period, with full history for trend analysis.

hasSupport.question: Is there support to interpret the data?
hasSupport.answer: Yes, our team of experts is available to help interpret the data and define improvement strategies.

CTASection.title: Take the first step toward high performance
CTASection.description: Start visualizing your engineering metrics clearly and in real time.

footerSection.description: Transforming software engineering with real-time DORA Metrics.
